name: Capital One Lounge Review – DFW Airport
description:
Join us inside the brand new Capital One Lounge in Dallas Fort Worth International Airport!

In this video, you’ll see everything this world-class lounge has to offer. You’ll see the Peloton room, the sleep pods, and – of course – the top-notch food and beverage offerings! 

Located near Gate D22 in Terminal D of the DFW Airport, the Capital One Lounge is open from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. 

We had the chance to see both breakfast and lunch options during our visit. We paid $65 per person because we do not have a Capital One credit card that includes access to the lounge. 

We thought it was worth the money for the food, drinks, amenities, and – perhaps best of all – views accessible only from the Capital One Lounge. But what do you think? Leave a comment and let us know whether you think it’s worth it!

Here’s a link to information about lounge access from Capital One themselves:
https://www.capitalone.com/about/newsroom/start-your-vacation-before-you-even-arrive/

0:00 Capital One Lounge Overview
1:46 Capital One Lounge Amenities
3:03 Capital One Lounge Food
3:50 Capital One Lounge Bar
4:18 Conclusion
